FuncDef: The file-format command sets the format for performance statistics files to be uploaded. The file-format command sets the format for performance statistics files to be uploaded. By default, a performance statistics file is generated in the text format.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies text as the format for performance statistics files.
-

Specifies xml as the format for performance statistics files.
-

ExtraInfo: To set the format of performance statistics files to .text or .xml, run the file-format command.
